title: Rising Moon
description: Finding out that she and her brother were demigods put Aria in the path of something dark and sinister. After coming face to face with evil, her world is shaken to its core. When new secrets are revealed, Aria will have to overcome her inner demons in order to protect the ones she loves.When tragedy strikes the Compound, Hunter is put to the ultimate test to prove once and for all that he does have what it takes to be the next Alpha of the NOLA pack. After unexpected visitors shed some light on his future with the pack, will he be able to rise to the occasion or will he leave the prophecy unfulfilled?
author: Amanda  Carol
